SEARCH
Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin

Class AdminAddFilmController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin.AdminAddFilmController
public class AdminAddFilmController extends Object
Controller class for the AdminAddFilm.fxml file. This class is responsible for handling the the user interactions and updating the UI for the page that allows the admin to add a new film to the database.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminAddFilmController

      public AdminAddFilmController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Pre-load values for the ComboBoxes

    • loadCategories

      private void loadCategories()
      Loads all categories possible to choose from (from the database) and populates ComboBox (with category objects). Display is steered by the Customer Cell factory. Updated attribute selectedCategory based on the choice made in the ComboBox.

    • loadRatings

      private void loadRatings()

    • loadLanguages

      private void loadLanguages()
      Loads all possible languages to choose from into the ComboBox and listens to the changes made by the staff member. Display is steered by the Custom Cell factory. Updates attribute selectedLanguage to the choice selected in the ComboBox.

    • loadSpecialFeatures

      private void loadSpecialFeatures()
      Loads the list of all possibile special features to choose from, into the ComboBox

    • loadActors

      private void loadActors()
      Loads into the ComboBox all actors registered in the actor table in the database The staff member can then choose an actor from this CB to be added to the selected film

    • tryToAddFilm

      private void tryToAddFilm()
      Method for adding a new film to the database. The method checks if all required fields are filled and if the information in the fields is valid. If the information is valid, the method adds the film to the database and the inventory.

    • tryToAddSF

      public void tryToAddSF()
      Method for adding a new special feature to the list of special features connected to the selected film. If the special feature is already in the list, an alert will be shown.

    • tryToAddActor

      public void tryToAddActor()
      Method for adding a new actor to the list of actors connected to the selected film. If the actor is already in the list, an alert will be shown.

    • updateDeleteActorsButtonVisibility

      private void updateDeleteActorsButtonVisibility()
      Method for updating the visibility of the button that allows the staff to delete selected actors from the selected film. If no actor is selected via checkboxes, the button should be invisible.

    • notifyActorSelected

      public void notifyActorSelected(Actor actor)
      Method for updating (adding to) the list of selected actors and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      actor -

    • notifyActorDeselected

      public void notifyActorDeselected(Actor actor)
      Method for updating (removing from) the list of selected actors and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      actor -

    • tryToDeleteSelectedActors

      public void tryToDeleteSelectedActors()
      Method for deleting the selected actors from the selected film.

    • updateDeleteSpecialFeaturesButtonVisibility

      private void updateDeleteSpecialFeaturesButtonVisibility()
      Method for updating the visibility of the button that allows the staff to delete selected special features from the selected film.

    • notifySpecialFeatureSelected

      public void notifySpecialFeatureSelected(String specialFeature)
      Method for updating (adding to) the list of selected special features and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      specialFeature -

    • notifySpecialFeatureDeselected

      public void notifySpecialFeatureDeselected(String specialFeature)
      Method for updating (removing from) the list of selected special features and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      specialFeature -

    • tryToDeleteSelectedSpecialFeatures

      public void tryToDeleteSelectedSpecialFeatures()
      Method for deleting the selected special features from the selected film.
